thread.title: Customer

author: Customer
title: Customer
text: I can't fault service. Ordered Friday after 1700 for next day fitting (paid premium for 2 hour timed slot this but needed the car) & was called back within 15 minutes to arrange a time. On the day was contacted by the fitter who was extremely polite & fitting done very quickly plus additional all-round checks to rest of the wheels. Very good & would definitely use again.
